titlestmt.titleproper: Presbyterian Sunday School Superintendents’ Association of Philadelphia and Vicinity records 1880-1971
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Presbyterian Sunday School Superintendents’ Association of Philadelphia and Vicinity records

bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Sunday School Superintendents’ Association of Philadelphia and Vicinity was formed to support and assist Philadelphia area superintendents in their work.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of minutes of the Presbyterian Sunday School Superintendents’ Association of Philadelphia and Vicinity, 1880-1971 (15 volumes). Minutes of monthly meetings include committee reports, lists of financial contributions, announcements, programs, and circulars. The collection also includes a scrapbook, 1901-1915, containing meeting announcements, correspondence, and brochures. Committees of the Association include the Orphanage Committee, Evangelistic Committee, Christian Citizenship Committee, Invitation Committee, Executive Committee, Membership, Hospital, Missionary, and others.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
